5: In ch'awinak chi jumul xukuje' camul, man c'o ta chi c'u jas quintiko.”
6: Ri Ajawaxel cuch'abej chi jumul ri Job chupam ri nimalaj quiakik'.
7: Ri Ajawaxel xubij: “Chac'utu' ri a chuk'ab chnuwäch camic, chatzelej c'u qui wäch we c'otoj tak chi'aj ri' chwe:
8: ¿La catzucuj nu k'alajisaxic chi man in ta suc' xukuje' chi in ajchak'mac, rech catk'alajin at chi man c'o ta a mac?
9: ¿La xa pa u sibalaj at co jacha' ri in? ¿La cakulja ri a ch'abal, jacha' ri wech in?
10: Chacojo a chuk'ab re nimalil xukuje' re nim u banic, cha ch'uku' awib ruc' juluwem xukuje' jolk'inic.
11: Chebawila' conojel ri caquiban tak nimal: chatzokopij ri awoyowal paquiwi' chebamach'irisaj c'ut.
12: Je, chebakasaj pa ulew ruc' ri qui ca'yexic awumal, chebaxak'alej ri banal tak etzelal jawije' ri e c'o wi.
13: Chebamuku' conojel chupam ri ulew, chebatz'apij chupam ri qui co'c ri cäminakib.
14: Kas in c'ut quinyo'w na a k'ij chi are' ri a cuinem xyo'w ri ch'äcanic chawe.
15: Chawila' ri jilijic Behemot, nu q'uiyisam junam awuc': cutij k'ayes jacha' ri wacax;
16: chawila' chi sibalaj co ri e uwo rachak, sibalaj c'o q'ui u chuk'ab tak ri riboch'il.
17: Ri u je' co jacha' ri chacalte', ri e riboch'il tak ri e rakan e t'ur tak.
18: Ri e u bakil e jacha' ri tutu re k'an ch'ich', e jacha' ri bolobak tak räx ch'ich'.
19: Nu chac wa' ri utzalaj u banic nu banom; xuwi ri in, ri winakirisal rech, quincuin che u kasaxic.
20: Chupam tak ri juyub ri quebetz'en tak wi ri juyubal tak awaj, quec'am wi ulok ri k'ayes rech cutijo.
21: Cak'oyi' chquixe' tak ri chjab, cuc'u' rib chquixo'l tak ri aj ri e c'o pa tak ri ja'.
22: Ri chjab quemujisanic, sutim rij cumal tak sak lemob ri e c'o chuxcut ri alaj nima'.
23: We caq'uiy ri nima' man cuxe'j ta rib; pune' copan ri nima' c'ä pa u tza'm man c'o ta jas cubij u c'u'x.
24: ¿Jachin ta ri ticarel c'u chapo quebuc'otij ta c'ut ri e u bak'wäch, o cuxim ta ri u tza'm ruc' jun colob?”
